title: SAFA: A Semi-Asynchronous Protocol for Fast Federated Learning With Low Overhead
summaries: in the conventional FL framework, propose __[1] lag-tolerant global model distribution to tolerate outdated local models__, __[2] post-training client selection to select $C$ fraction of less-involved clients__, and __[3] discriminative global aggregation__ as clients are classified into [1] picked [2] undrafted [3] crashed to address low round efficiency and poor convergence rate problems in extreme conditions (e.g. clients dropping offline frequently)
